targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s)*8 as "in" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
list.label: Host
list.name: Device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
